architectureStyle.description: Massive, brutal, reptilian - built for large cold-blooded beings who value strength
keyElements: Oversized everything - Gorn are much larger than humans
Heavy, brutalist construction to support massive weight
Rock and cave integration - Gorn appreciate natural stone
Heating elements visible - cold-blooded species need warmth
Dark green and brown coloring matching Gorn scales
Combat arenas and gladiatorial features common
architectureStyle.colors: Dark green, brown, bronze, copper, rock gray
architectureStyle.materials: Heavy stone, reinforced metal, volcanic rock, heat-conductive materials
